name: Black Out (Pistol) (Ez Aim) [V.1.2]
description:
(EXTERNAL MOUSE REQUIRED)

Controls (scroll down): 

WASD // Arrow Keys    =   Movement Controls

MouseButton1 // Space = Shoot

"R" = Reload your Pistol

"E" = Throw a Grenade

"T" = Turn on Laser Pointer

"G" = Turn off Laser Pointer

   

                                    Objective: 

Defend yourself from as many Robots as possible, and stop them without dieing!
